channel.title: How do i make an emote button take you somwhere?
channel.description: i need to know how when you click the emote buttons it like take you to the x and y cordiantes you want and how do i change the name of the button some1 could possibly giv me a tut or tell me? ty if you do help me my server is almost done plz help :D

item.title: How do i make an emote button take you somwhere?
item.dc:creator: @jjones10 jjones10
item.description:
@jjones10 wrote:

Try this:

case 169: // no emote tele(3165, 9628); sendMessage("Welcome Home!"); break;

And to make it a different tab, use a different case
